scripts.deploy-studio: graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --studio -l v0.0.3 harvest-zksync && npm run after-deploy
scripts.deploy-studio-old: graph codegen && graph build && graph deploy --studio -l v0.1.13 l2-zksync-era
